author: dlr
msg: Made test case for nested, curly-braced blocks more devilish.

author: dlr
msg: * Removed some unnecessary instance variables that, while perhaps nice
as an optimization, reduced maintainability and mutability.
* Put closing paren for converted #set directives in the right place.
* Refactored convertTemplate(String) using new makeSubstRE(int) macro.
* More explicit about the flow through main().

author: geirm
msg: Added support for the app exceptions to make for better debugging, and
put that message to the browser as well via a VelocityServlet.error()

author: geirm
msg: *Huge* mistake on my part.  Of course we have to flush VelocityWriter.
A thousand pardons if this screwed anyone up.
My penance will be to add a cactus test case to the testbed.
